mapper.select: SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId = #{inId}
SELECT outId FROM eqpt_outrepository WHERE outId = #{outId}
SELECT inId FROM eqpt_inrepository WHERE inId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{inId},'%'))

SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS inId FROM w_ywcgddhtpsb WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS inId FROM w_fwcgxqsqd WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END' UNION SELECT DISTINCT F_WDBH AS inId FROM w_rccgddhtps WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT inInfo FROM eqpt_inrepository) AND INST_STATUS_ = 'SUCCESS_END'

SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx.F_CGSL AS inNum,w_jyd.F_WDBH AS 'check',w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx,w_jyd WHERE w_cgmx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_ywcgddhtpsb WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx.F_CGSL AS inNum,'' AS 'check','' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx,w_jyd WHERE w_cgmx.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_ywcgddhtpsb WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = (SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx1.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx1.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx1.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx1.F_CGSL AS inNum,w_jyd.F_WDBH AS 'check',w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx1,w_jyd WHERE w_cgmx1.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_fwcgxqsqd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx1.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx1.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx1.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx1.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx1.F_CGSL AS inNum,'' AS 'check','' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx1,w_jyd WHERE w_cgmx1.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_fwcgxqsqd WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx1.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = (SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx11.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx11.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx11.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx11.F_CGSL AS inNum,w_jyd.F_WDBH AS 'check',w_jyd.F_XLH AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx11,w_jyd WHERE w_cgmx11.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_rccgddhtps WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx11.F_WLBM AND w_jyd.F_WLBM = eqpt_material.id UNION SELECT DISTINCT w_cgmx11.F_WLBM AS materialId,w_cgmx11.F_WLMC AS materialName,w_cgmx11.F_GGXH AS spec,w_cgmx11.F_CGSL AS inNum,'' AS 'check','' AS sn,(eqpt_material.unit) AS unit,eqpt_material.remark AS remark FROM eqpt_material,w_cgmx11,w_jyd WHERE w_cgmx11.REF_ID_ = (SELECT DISTINCT ID_ FROM w_rccgddhtps WHERE F_WDBH = #{wdbh} ORDER BY ID_ DESC LIMIT 1) AND eqpt_material.id = w_cgmx11.F_WLBM AND eqpt_material.id = (SELECT id FROM eqpt_material WHERE eqpt_material.id not in (SELECT F_WLBM FROM w_jyd)) ORDER BY materialId
